title: University Place Cafeteria
story: The Gathering. The starting point. Like the mass meetings of the civil rights era, we begin with community orientation.

title: Alumni Auditorium
story: The Threshold. We exit the comfort of the gathering and walk to the Auditorium. This is the space of confrontation and history.

title: Harris Commons
story: The Processing. A necessary pause. After the weight of the Auditorium, we enter Harris Commons to breathe and process.

title: Latham Hall
story: The Reflection. The core interactive zone. Here, we engage with the 5 Stations of Preparation.

title: Belief
description: Name the conviction that holds you steady when everything else shifts.

title: Courage
description: Call out the moment you choose bravery over comfort.

title: Identity
description: Who are you when nobody is watching and nobody is clapping.

title: Listening
description: Justice starts when we listen long enough to be changed.

title: Preparation
description: Freedom is built. What are you training for right now.
